hero.subtitle: Welcome to Medicare
hero.description: At Medicare, we combine top doctors with the most advanced medical technology to provide the optimal treatment plan. Your health is our highest mission.

intro.title: Medical Team
intro.description: A dedicated team of doctors with high expertise and many years of experience working at major central and Hanoi hospitals.

intro.title: Online Consultation
intro.description: Busy and unable to schedule a visit but need specialist advice? Doctor4U connects you with doctors wherever you are, with flexible hours.

intro.title: Home Medical Checkup
intro.description: Home visits, also known as family doctor service, include examining, caring for, and managing each family member's health. With a well-trained, experienced, and dedicated team, Doctor4U helps families confidently monitor and take care of individual health.

intro.title: Chronic Disease Care
intro.description: Need specialist advice for health issues? Doctor4U acts as your family doctor, monitoring and managing chronic diseases with experienced specialists.
